mosinstall.name: Popular Songs
mosinstall.author: Nino Coelho
mosinstall.copyright: This template is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: This module shows a list of the most popular Songs.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category or set of Categories (to specify more than one Category, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: writerid
param.label: Writer ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Writer or set of Writers (to specify more than one Writer, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
